cab.content: Military Secret.1449From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 1.90tith January 1921.No. 227. (1) denial Pasha and Maulvi Barkatulla reported to be sending agents to North-West Frontier tribal territory. Report that small jirgas of. Afridis and Mohmands have been smnmoned to Kabul.(2) Shah Dan!a and Haji Abdur Razik have arrived at Shakin in Afghan territory. Total line and rifles received from Wana Waziris up to 30th December : Government rifles 107, tribal rifles 98, Rs. 38,000. Some of the leaders of hostile sections now showing signs of coming in.(3) Waziristan. Nothing to report except some small raids on lines of communications.Para. (1) not given to Press.
